title: Alright Rito; which one of you smart-asses did this?

embed.description: 나오자마자 알았는데 리플레이 구해본다고 별짓 다해봤지만 PBE는 리플레이가 안되네요 ㅠㅠ :) 별의 수호자 징크스 춤 파돌리기 춤 원본 : http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm18663839 --------------------------- GMC naver : http://cafe.naver.com/teamprovide

body:
Of all the things. 

Bloody Leek-spin.

That's some wild nostalgia buzz I haven't seen in like 10 years.

replies.body:
I think that the reason is because of this: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqFhzodjpp8

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oNtG0s08,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-24T14:58:30.620+0000)
>
> I think that the reason is because of this: 
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqFhzodjpp8

Which in itself came as a result of the original leekspin. The song 'Levan Polkka' was adopted by the vocaloids and a dance was formed for it; the dance you see in my OP. Someone just got the bright idea to throw MMD into the mix.

> [{quoted}](name=Furor Nexis,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oNtG0s08,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-24T15:21:00.815+0000)
>
> Which in itself came as a result of the original leekspin. The song 'Levan Polkka' was adopted by the vocaloids and a dance was formed for it; the dance you see in my OP. Someone just got the bright idea to throw MMD into the mix.

I know that the original dance is that, but the reason of why Riot added that Dance in the SG Jinx is because of the video of the magical girls + guns that fits with the theme of SG Jinx.

TFW "Ievan Polkka" is supposed to be spelled with capital "i"

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/746/291/adf.jpg
I agree with Correcting the spelling, but that is the wrong pic to go with it
Well, I was punished for my laziness. Perhaps I shouldn't try to be funny with my low amounts of wit. :/

Ebonmaw's post doesn't invalidate the Levan Polkka :D

However, theme-wise it seems more appropriate (Madoka and guns, duh), and it's right behind the original in terms of memetasticness.
Wellp my day is complete.
Well..even though they are Vocaloids, i think i've seen enough anime for the next 90 years or so.

I'm not gonna say it was Riot Curing.

But it was Riot Curing
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/9/9d/Loituma.gif
The Best Shonen Jump Anime by far.

I was wondering what it was from. now I know... and knowing is half the battle O.O

 http://www.toyhypeusa.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/GIJOE_logo.jpg

...I'll see myself out now
You are half right. Actual source of Jinx's dance: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqFhzodjpp8
wtf did i watch lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Rozair,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oNtG0s08,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-09-24T23:48:31.049+0000)
>
> wtf did i watch lmao



Old-school meme magic.
Good Lord, it's glorious!

I'm just gonna take a shot in the dark and say it's not the guy who made this:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hj1Xf16ZCwg

http://leekspin.com/

right click and press rewind
press forward
repeat until you summon teemo
Damn that song's catchy.
Hatsune Miku Ievan Polkka
Didn't Crazy Frog also do a version of Ievan Polkka as well?  The voice kinda reminds me of that as well.
Nah its Hatsune Mikus I'd know her voice anywhere.
I know that, it just sounds similar to Crazy Frog's as well...somewhat.  Hang on a bit...  *searches*  Ah, narflax...it's not on YouTube...
Crazy Frog uses computer programs to make their voice like that. Hatsune Miku is a compute program. No surprise their voice is slightly similar.
Now it won't get out of my head. DAMN YOU!

LEEKSPIN DOT COM
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Leek, as in the vegetable. Not leak, a hole through which things may accidentally pass. 
Always fun to see references though, especially when I understand them ^_^

Now for the real question: who inspired that person to dance around with vegetables?
Ohhh that's where I knew it from!
Idk why but jinx's dance is incredibly satisfying

Honestly, this reference makes me so happy... 

"Go Home Homura, You Are Drunk" is one of my favorite videos so seeing it implemented into LoL is radical! XD
sick find man {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Can they just play this music when she dances?
one rioter is a kpop fan he did alot of other dances like this too
Wait...those two Poro she has with her.  I'm getting a Tatl and Tael vibe now.  Does she have Majora's Mask hiding somewhere?
I LOVE THIS!!!
holy shit the old but gold meme

I KNEW I SAW IT SOME WHERE!!!!!!!

THANK YOU!!!!!!
